results.title: String Art Love Live Laugh Sign, Love Live Laugh, Farmhouse décor signs, living room wall décor, farmhouse chic sign, rustic decor
results.description:
String Art Love Live Laugh Sign, Love Live Laugh, Farmhouse décor signs, living room wall décor, farmhouse chic sign, rustic decor

This String Art Love Live Laugh Sign is set of 3 wooden signs. It is  both a farmhouse décor sign and living room wall décor. Some people can use it as a farmhouse chic sign, while it is good idea for housewarming gift  for others.

CHARACTERISTICS of assembled Love Live Laugh Sign are:

Height is about 13.7 inches (or 35 cm); each of the three plates is about 3.9 inches (or 10 cm) plus  gapes between plates;
Width is about 8.2 inches (or 21 cm).

String Art Words are made with nails and twine.
All parts of  Laugh Love Live Sign are connected with the help of twine.


FEATURES of String Art Love Live Laugh Sign are:  

This String Art Love Live Laugh Sign is both a décor and the simplest way to stay happy and in good mood.

Such rustic decor is the perfect addition to farmhouse. But it is also a good idea for loft style decoration. Sure enough, such inspirational wall hangings  fits in with any room and anywhere.

String Art Laugh Love Live Sign is the best gift for everyone who is looking for some motivation. It would be good for different occasion at all.
Particularly, as a housewarming gift.

ATTENTION!

Keep in mind that not all plywood looks the same. As there are some pieces that may have different wood grain, but that's what makes your sign  original. 

Please remember that due to different computer settings, stain may vary slightly from what you see in example photos. 

I also cannot guarantee that some of characteristics of string art décor (location of knots, how the string will across and so on) may be exactly the same, but I take great pride in my work and would not sell anything that I wouldn’t display on my own home or wouldn’t present to my best friends or my parents.

All signs I do by myself, if you need individually order, please contact me.

Thank you for visiting my shop: https://www.etsy.com/shop/ColorfulCobwebArt

results.title: Hanging Wall Decor Sign - Welcome Vertical Wall Art Decorations, Rustic Home Accessories for Living Room
results.description:
RUSTIC WALL DECOR – This shabby chic wall décor sign brings a unique and elegant touch to your home! This sign displays positive words that make you feel at home (Family, Home, Live, Laugh, Love, Happiness). This farmhouse decoration has a wooden look that makes a perfect home accessory that is suitable for indoor or outdoor hanging.
HIGHEST QUALITY – This vintage style home décor sign is very strong/sturdy and has proven durability. This sign is made of MDF which is an engineered wood that is extremely long-lasting. This 6-panel hanging plaque is connected securely with a rustic rope that provides for easy hanging.
LARGE SIZE – Measures 33” long and 12” wide. No assembly required! Ready to hang on the wall!
PERFECT GIFT! Watch as they open their favorite new home décor gift! They will love this wall décor for countless years to come! Great gift for any occasion including Birthdays, Christmas, House Warming, Graduation, Anniversary and more.
WORRY FREE GAURANTEE: EcoRise is a small family business based in the USA and we stand behind the quality of our wall décor. We offer a 100% guarantee that you are fully satisfied with your product or you receive your money back with no hassle.

results.title: Live Laugh Love Sign, Live Laugh Love Cutting Board, Wedding Cutting Board Personalized, Chopping Board Personalised, Housewarming Gift
results.description:
At Blue Ridge Boards, we create beautiful, personalized cutting boards for all occasions. Our cutting boards make great gifts for weddings, anniversaries, engagements, housewarming and much more.

ABOUT OUR CUTTING BOARDS:
The design that you are purchasing is fully engraved into the wood, ensuring that it becomes an integral part of the piece. It is even said that wood elements within your home can bring balance to your space and life. Many of our cutting boards can be personalized with your desired name(s), date and more.

DETAILS:
• This cutting board is available in three different wood species: walnut (darker color), cherry (a light color with a slight red tint) & maple (lighter color).
• Our regular rectangular boards measure 9" x 12" x ¾".
• Our rectangular juice groove boards measure 8" x 12".
• Our mini boards measures 7" x 8" x ¾". These mini sizes are more of a square shape.
• We currently offer a variety of different cutting board options. See all listing photos for board types and colors. Please select your desired board type from the drop-down menu during checkout.
• Each cutting board is completely unique. The grain of the wood will vary, as each board is made with different wood. Some boards may engrave slightly lighter or darker than pictured. Please note, example photo boards do not have conditioner applied. Your board may be slightly darker or lighter than pictured. Because this is laser engraved, some slight burn marks may be visible around the design.
• Our cutting boards are finished with a light layer of high-quality food grade butcher block conditioner made from mineral oil and natural waxes so that it is ready to use immediately.
• All designs can be engraved on any cutting board that we offer! Have something a little bit different in mind? Contact us for more information on designing a custom piece.
• Stands are available separately for easily displaying your cutting board - https://www.etsy.com/listing/611230526/stand-add-on

HOW TO PLACE AN ORDER:
1. Select your desired board type from the drop-down menu.
2. Follow the checkout procedure. If ordering a personalized board, enter your personalization in the provided box during checkout. Please double check for any spelling errors. Your text will be engraved exactly as it is provided to us.
3. Wait for your new cutting board to arrive.

*cutting boards are not dishwasher or microwave safe

results.title: Live Laugh Love Sunflower Sublimation Print
results.description: Sublimation printsAdult size xl is 12.25" wide or 14" tall, whichever is smaller depending on the proportions of the designAdult size is 10.7" wide or 12.5" tall, whichever is smaller depending on the proportions of the designYouth size is 8.3" wide or 10.7" tall, whichever is smaller depending on the proportions of the designToddler size is 7" wide or 9" tall, whichever is smaller depending on the proportions of the designInfant size is 2 per sheet, 5" wide or 7" tall, whichever is smaller depending on the proportions of the designCoozie size is 4 per sheet, 3.5" wide or tall, whichever is smaller depending on the proportions of the designSublimation instructionsIf you are new to sublimation please familiarize yourself with the process and application to achieve your desired results. Make sure to practice first.For application on 50% polyester or higher materials (these DO NOT work on 100% cotton!) 100% white polyester will produce the best color results. You can use shirts that are light in color like: lt gray, tan, pastels, but know your colors will be faded. 50% poly will achieve a more faded vintage look and will lose some color in it's first wash. Do not wash inside out or the lost color may get trapped inside the shirt and stain.1.Set your heat press to 375-400 degrees. If you find your white shirts yellow at 400, lower your temp. You can rinse in peroxide water mix to help remove any yellowing as well.Time: 45-60 secondsPressure: Medium2.Place sheets of white copy paper or parchment paper inside your shirt to prevent bleed through.3.Position your transfer face down (use heat tape if desired) and cover with White copy paper or parchment (not wax paper, un-coated un-dyed parchment paper)The dye turns into a gas when heated, and is absorbed into the shirt. It can also transfer to and stain the top of your press and the inside/back of your shirt if you do not use the blow out paper inside the shirt and on top of the print.4.Press 45-60 seconds on med pressure5.Remove transfer immediately. Don't let the print sit there, and Do not try to close and repress, the print will always shift slightly when you lift the lid and cause a ghosting/double print effect if it's not removed immediately

results.title: Kitchen towels with knitted tops - Inspirational text
results.description:
These kitchen towels are a variation on an old favourite. The traditional version was crocheted and had a button sewn into it. Unfortunately, the buttons were often too small and would easily undo when brushed against. They also fell off or caught things in the wash. These towels have a larger knitted button that does not come undone because of its size, does not fall off because it is part of the towel, and does not catch things in the wash.

These towels are the regular thickness.  If you would like a thicker towel, check my other ads.  Thicker towels are listed as "thicker" or "double".

Some of these towels come with different coloured tops. If you require a specific colour for the top of your towel, please contact me before ordering.

results.title: Live, Laugh, Love, beautiful, home quote, butterflies, Wall Art Vinyl Decal Sticker
results.description:
Beautiful finishing touch to your home
It is available in all of our 25 matt vinyl colours.

This decal is available in 3 sizes:
ALL SIZES QUOTED ARE IN CENTIMETRES (CM)

Size 1  - 42cm wide x 75cm high
Size 2 - 55cm wide x 100cm high
size 3 - 58cm wide x 120cm high

The decal is cut from high quality vinyl, and when applied will look as if it has been painted on your wall, as the finish will be seamless.

Full instructions are supplied, and aftercare support is available should it be needed. 

We take great care in our work, and for us customer satisfaction is our priority.

Any questions, do not hesitate to contact us.

Your decal will be supplied rolled, in a postal tube. Postage and packaging is free.

We recommend that our decals are applied to matt paint. We cannot guarantee bonding between our decals and other types of wall paint. They also stick to many other surfaces including glass, and gloss paint on woodwork. We can supply test pieces when needed for a small fee.
Please also ensure your surface is clean, dust free and smooth. 

As always, we are here to answer all queries. Thank you for taking the time to view our item, and bare with us as we add new items to our shop. Ana and Ant

Live, Laugh, Love? More like Die, Frown, Hate!!  digital print  wall art. 

**Instant Download - No physical items will be shipped**

You will receive two  high quality digital files that will print in 8x10 inch size:
PDF and JPG

Frame your print & put on display in your home.



PLEASE NOTE: 
- The frame in the photo is just a display suggestion. You will NOT have a frame print with your image.

- Due to the difference in colour that each monitor can show, there is a chance of slight colour variation. We do not offer refunds on digital files, but will try our best to help with any problems you might encounter. 

- We strongly recommend using your best/highest quality print setting on your printer or having the file printed by a printing professional. 

- All files are for personal use only and cannot be used commercially or be resold/redistributed.


Thanks for taking the time to look at our prints!

These items are not licensed products and all images of characters used in the designs are free and not being sold.
